nodes.text: The Scourge was a Qektoth attack cruiser that was in use by the Qektoth Confederation as of 8 ABY. It fought against the New Republic corvette FarStar while in the Qu'mock system. The Scourge was defeated as the ship was unable to counter attacks from multiple fire arcs due to the design of the vessel's power generation system.

The fate of the Scourge is not explictedly stated. It is assumed to be defeated because the FarStar survives the encounter. Since it appears in a RPG adventure, this may have been done by the game designers to allow the gamesmaster to use the ship as a recurring threat to the players.
